issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: CBO Trunk Merge: Test Failure input23

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Logical Optimizer
components.description: Optimizations which are independent of runtime.

fields.description:
Query like 

 select * from (select a.key as ak, a.value as av, b.key as bk, b.value as bv from src a join src1 b where a.key = '428' ) c;

will fail as

FAILED: Execution Error, return code 2 from org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.mr.MapRedTask
fields.summary: inconsistence between colList and columnExprMap when ConstantPropagate is applied to subquery

comments.body: HIVE-8076 creates subquery and has constant predicates. Thus it fails too.

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12669842/HIVE-8184.1.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 471 failed/errored test(s), 6294 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
{noformat}
